QUESTION: ¬(N ∧ ¬P ) where N = "I will go" and P = "you will go"
ANSWER2: I will go and you will too
ANSWER3: I will not go if you go

QUESTION: ¬Q → R where Q  ="It will rain soon" and R ="Crop will fail"
ANSWER2: It is going to rain and the crop will fail
ANSWER3: The crop is going to fail
CORRECT: Unless it rains soon the crop will fail

QUESTION: B ∧ ¬C where B = "there is smoke" and C = "there is fire"
ANSWER1: There is always fire when there is no smoke
ANSWER2: There is fire or there is smoke
CORRECT: It is not true that there’s no smoke without fire
